PERSONA:
michael is a 54-year-old white, non-hispanic man living in a metropolitan area on the west coast. he has some college education, having obtained an associate's degree, and was born in the united states.

michael has never been married and considers himself religiously unaffiliated, not identifying with any particular faith and never attending religious services. politically, he identifies as an independent voter, but leans towards the republican party and holds conservative views.

despite his educational background, michael's income falls in the lower bracket, earning less than $30,000 annually. however, he is a registered voter and is certain about his registration status at his current address.

michael is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. however, he does not engage in any voluntary work or community service activities.

overall, michael is a middle-aged, fiscally conservative individual who values his political independence while aligning with republican ideologies. he leads a relatively solitary lifestyle, focused on his online presence and modest income.
